professional_summary: Experienced professional with expertise in project management, SharePoint development, data analysis, and social media marketing. Proven track record of driving efficiency and collaboration across diverse teams and organizations.

key_responsibilities: Provides project management support to the Bureau of Navy Medicine (BUMED's) Capabilities Integration leadership.
Supports clients by prioritizing and completing deliverables such as curating meeting minutes
completing comment review matrixes
meeting coordination
data analysis projects
managing tasker distribution systems
and creating and routing action packages.
Designed
presented
and implemented a framework for creating an intuitive SharePoint site to replace outdated applications and act as a repository for storing data
documents
and workflows. Directly managed SharePoint development and fostered collaboration between IT Department and client.
Promoted company and products using social media platforms.
Managed team of content creators to engage VCU students on social media accounts.
Expanded Barstool VCU followers from 400 to 3
400 in six months on Instagram account.
Managed databases and administered software updates company-wide.
Updated websites and set up products with PDFs.
Performed data analysis and reporting.
Identified issues and made recommendations for clients.
Conducted market analysis and supported the entrepreneurship academy.
Assisted in exploring export capabilities for avocados.
